backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with user roles, profiles, vehicle tracking, routes, trips, alerts, and access-control‑based authorization helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that maps old actor state to the new state structure unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing dashboard-related feature updates, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated text summaries of key frontend components, dashboards, hooks, and services.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining color tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the frontend with a root div and module script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup handling authentication, profile/role gating, and routing to all dashboards and pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/PrincipalI: Input component that validates principal IDs with inline error handling.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsBad: Alerts badge button showing unseen alert count and marking alerts as seen when visiting the alerts page.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects and saves a user's name using a mutation and shows loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RolePending: Displays an access-pending message and provides a logout option for users without an assigned role.
frontend/src/components/branding/TraemeW: Renders the Traeme logo and wordmark with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Shows a list of ongoing trips with loading states and links to the full trips page.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alerts: Displays recent alerts filtered by route and links to the full alerts page.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Assign: Shows details for the user’s assigned route, including stops and status.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Driver: Provides start and end trip controls for drivers based on assigned vehicle and route.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EtaSum: Calculates and displays ETA for the most relevant active trip and vehicle location.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GpsTra: Enables starting and stopping GPS tracking for an assigned vehicle with status display.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pickup: Shows recent pickup/drop-off records and links to manage all records.
Displays the three most recent pickup/drop-off records with loading and empty states, linking to the full records page.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Vehicl: Shows real-time vehicle location details for an assigned route or first available vehicle, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, role-based navigation, footer, and auto-redirect based on user role.
frontend/src/components/navigation/RoleN: Renders role-specific navigation links combined with common links based on the current user's role.
frontend/src/components/tracking/DriverL: Form for drivers to manually update their vehicle’s latitude and longitude via mutation.
frontend/src/constants/assets.ts: Exports paths to static image assets including logo, splash background, and team member images.
frontend/src/content/team.ts: Defines team member data including id, name, role, bio, and associated images.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryKeys.ts: Defines reusable React Query keys for users, vehicles, routes, trips, alerts, and pickup/dropoff data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlerts.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, filtering, creating, and tracking unseen alerts with optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches the current user profile and exposes helpers for checking specific user roles.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePickupDrop: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pickup/dropoff records using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useRoutes.ts: Defines hooks to load, create, update, and deactivate route records with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTrips.ts: Implements trip-related queries and mutations, including starting and ending trips and fetching active trips.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Fetches all user profiles through a simple React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useVehicleLoc: Handles reading and updating vehicle location data with optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGpsVehicleTracking: Tracks GPS location for a vehicle, periodically updating backend state and handling errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, themes, and fonts for the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission details and team member cards using data from teamMembers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access denied message with an option to navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriverAssi: Provides a form for admins to assign drivers to vehicles and routes using mutations and route data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Lets admins assign roles to users by principal ID through a simple form and mutation flow.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoutesPage: Allows admins to create, update, and deactivate bus routes with dynamic stop management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUserManage: Shows searchable user profiles with roles and assignments, linking to role and driver management pages.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists alerts with timestamps, marking them as seen and showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing user greeting, active trips, and navigation cards for admin and general features.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/DriverDash: Renders the driver dashboard, showing user info and widgets for route summary, trip controls, GPS tracking, and pickup checklist.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ParentDash: Displays the parent dashboard with widgets for vehicle location, alerts, pickup/dropoff preview, and assigned route summary.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/StudentDas: Shows the student dashboard with vehicle location, ETA summary, and assigned route summary widgets.
frontend/src/pages/DriverProfilePage.tsx: Shows the logged-in driver's personal and assignment information with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid gallery of team member photos with names and roles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and redirects authenticated users to the parent dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PickupDropoffPage.tsx: Lists pickup and drop-off records with status, timestamps, and student info, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesPage.tsx: Shows active routes with stop lists and provides an admin link to manage routes.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a splash screen with branding and redirects authenticated users, offering navigation to login.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Shows real-time vehicle locations, allows drivers to update their location, and lists vehicles with route and timing info.
frontend/src/pages/TripsPage.tsx: Displays all trips with status, vehicle, route info, and loading states, allowing drivers/admins to edit.
frontend/src/services/actorClient.ts: Provides error handling for actor calls, mapping unauthorized errors to a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/services/alertService.ts: Wrapper functions for fetching, creating, and querying alerts through the backend actor.
frontend/src/services/authService.ts: Implements logout by clearing auth state and React Query cache.
frontend/src/services/driverService.ts: Provides a backend call to assign a driver's vehicle and route.
frontend/src/services/index.ts: Re-exports all service modules for unified access.
frontend/src/services/pickupDropoffServi: Functions to fetch, create, update, and query pickup/dropoff records via the backend.
frontend/src/services/routeService.ts: Service for CRUD operations and queries on routes through the backend.
frontend/src/services/tripService.ts: Backend wrappers for managing trips, including status updates and explicit start/end actions.
frontend/src/services/userService.ts: Provides user profile CRUD, role assignment, and admin checks through the backend actor.
frontend/src/services/vehicleService.ts: Backend calls to get and update vehicle location data.
frontend/src/utils/eta.ts: Calculates ETA strings based on trip status and recent vehicle location updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, architecture, and implemented features for a role-based transportation app.
